card.text1: Discover Invest company has several project managers in the construction industry. This specialist is responsible for successfully completing the construction project entrusted to him. He oversees the entire process from the planning stage and approval of project documents to the launch of the project. Sometimes he also performs the tasks of the next stage of the project.
card.title2: I congratulate everyone with the coming NEW YEAR!
card.text2: The complex interior design not only creates a comfortable living environment and a convenient navigation system for you to easily exit the required floor or area.
card.text3: The transport infrastructure allows you to easily move to any point of the city: you just need to choose the necessary and necessary direction.
card.title4: We continue to introduce you to our multi-functional objects Discover Invest.
card.text4: We continue to introduce you to our multi-functional objects Discover Invest. One of them is a multi-apartment residential complex built in the Yangiyo'yat district of Tashkent. The total construction area is 12 hectares. So far, 29 apartments have been built.
